str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Expressly, explicitly, in so many words. Adverb from a derivative of rheo; out-spokenly, i.e. Distinctly.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Later, latter, last. Comparative from hupo; later.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and histemi; to remove, i.e. instigate to revolt; usually to desist, desert, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and echo; to hold the mind towards, i.e. Pay attention to, be cautious about, apply oneself to, adhere to.
Roving, i.e. an impostor or misleader.
An evil-spirit, demon; a heathen deity. Neuter of a derivative of daimon; a d?Monic being; by extension a deity.
